title: Less - portrayal of Arthur Less at resort

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Greer uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex portrayal of Arthur Less.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Greer uses literary elements and techniques to develop a complex portrayal of Arthur Less.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
